function: Allow users to create new to-do items with a title and optional description.
static_description: A form at the top of the page includes a text input labeled 'Title', a text area labeled 'Description', and a submit button with an add icon [addTaskIcon]. The background is lavender (#E6E6FA) and all components use indigo (#4B0082) styling.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking the submit button saves the new task to the database and clears the input fields. The newly added task appears at the top of the task list.
Pressing Enter while focused on the title input field submits the form if both title and description are valid.

function: Enable editing of existing to-do items including their title and description.
static_description: Each task in the list displays an edit icon [editTaskIcon] next to its checkbox and delete button. When clicked, the task switches to an inline-edit mode showing pre-filled inputs for title and description.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking the edit icon replaces the task display with editable input fields populated with current values. A save button confirms changes and updates the task in the database.

function: Permit deletion of to-do items permanently from the system.
static_description: Each task shows a delete icon [deleteTaskIcon] aligned to the right side of the task row. Icons are styled with indigo color.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking the delete icon removes the corresponding task from the database and updates the UI immediately without requiring confirmation.

function: Support toggling completion status of to-do items.
static_description: Each task entry features a checkbox component positioned to the left of the task title. Completed tasks appear visually distinct through strikethrough text and reduced opacity.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking the checkbox toggles the task’s is_completed status in the database and visually updates the task style accordingly — applying strikethrough when marked complete and removing it when reverted.

resource_dependency.taskDataSchema: Database table named 'tasks' with fields: id (UUID, primary key), title (string, required), description (text, optional), is_completed (boolean, default false), created_at (timestamp), updated_at (timestamp)

function: Allow filtering of tasks based on their completion status.
static_description: Above the task list, there are three filter buttons labeled 'All', 'Completed', and 'Pending'. These buttons are styled with indigo backgrounds and lavender borders.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking 'All' displays every task. Clicking 'Completed' filters only completed tasks (is_completed = true). Clicking 'Pending' filters only incomplete tasks (is_completed = false). Selected filter remains highlighted.

function: Enable keyword-based search within task titles and descriptions.
static_description: At the top of the interface, just above the task creation form, there is a search bar labeled 'Search Tasks'. It has a magnifying glass icon and uses indigo-styled input styling.

interaction_and_states.description: As the user types, the displayed task list dynamically filters to show only those tasks whose title or description contains the entered keywords (case-insensitive partial match).

resource_dependency.taskDataSchema: Database table named 'tasks' with fields: id (UUID, primary key), title (string, required), description (text, optional), is_completed (boolean, default false), created_at (timestamp), updated_at (timestamp)

function: Present all available to-do items in a scrollable list view.
static_description: Below the filters and search bar, a vertically scrollable container lists all tasks. Each task row spans full width with consistent padding, lavender background, and indigo borders separating rows.

interaction_and_states.description: Vertical scrolling allows browsing through long lists of tasks without pagination. No additional loading mechanism is triggered upon scroll.

function: Visually differentiate between completed and pending tasks.
static_description: Tasks marked as completed have grayed-out text with a line-through effect applied to the title and description. Pending tasks retain normal font weight and standard text color.

function: Provide a dedicated input field for entering short task titles.
static_description: Above the main task list, a single-line text input field labeled 'New Task Title' is present. Styled with indigo border and lavender fill.

interaction_and_states.description: Users enter task titles into this field which serves as the primary identifier during task creation.

function: Offer space for detailed notes or instructions related to a task.
static_description: Adjacent to the title input, a multi-line text area labeled 'Task Description' allows extended input. Also styled with indigo theme elements.

interaction_and_states.description: Users can provide more context about the task in this area, supporting line breaks and longer content than the title field.

function: Render checkboxes for easy status updates of individual tasks.
static_description: To the far left of each task row, a square checkbox element indicates whether the task is completed. Checked boxes feature a filled checkmark.

interaction_and_states.description: Toggling the checkbox instantly updates the task's completion state in the backend and modifies the visual presentation of the task accordingly.

function: Supply a control for immediate removal of tasks.
static_description: Each task row ends with a small trash bin icon [deleteTaskIcon], colored in indigo, serving as the delete trigger for that specific task.

interaction_and_states.description: Activating this icon deletes the associated task from the database and refreshes the visible list.

function: Provide controls to switch views among different task statuses.
static_description: Three horizontally-aligned buttons labeled 'All', 'Completed', and 'Pending' sit above the task list. Active filter is indicated via underlined label and bold font.

interaction_and_states.description: Selecting any button adjusts the task listing to reflect only the chosen subset: All (no filter), Completed (only checked tasks), or Pending (unchecked tasks).

function: Facilitate quick location of specific tasks using typed queries.
static_description: A prominent search input field labeled 'Find Tasks...' sits near the top of the page, featuring rounded corners and indigo-themed styling.

interaction_and_states.description: Real-time filtering narrows down the task list to match the query against both title and description fields of all stored tasks.

function: Maintain uniformity across UI elements using lavender backgrounds and indigo accents.
static_description: Entire application viewport uses a soft lavender background (#E6E6FA). All interactive components such as buttons, forms, and cards utilize indigo (#4B0082) for borders, icons, and highlights.
